intro.headline: A Warm Welcome Awaits
intro.text: Nestled in the snowy landscapes of Myoko, Moriyuki offers a perfect blend of comfort and nature. Whether you're here for the world-class powder snow or the serene mountain views, our guesthouse is your home away from home.
